Install matlab on centos7 server

If the matlab wont start the gui, install xeyes and see if you can see an eye on your X2go session. sudo yum install xeyes

If you can't see anything, This is an XWindows issue, not a MATLAB issue. Use the following command to change display config

export DISPLAY=machine_name:0

where machine_name is the name of the computer being used. Machine_name can be find in /etc/hosts Also, the zero at the end of the statement should be the port number of the computer's display.
